description: ZSNES provides numerous save states from 0 to 99 (file extensions ZS0, .ZS1 , .ZS2 , and so on). Users can change the game save state by pressing the "F3" key and using the arrow keys to navigate to one of the 0-9 states, or by selecting the "Pick State" option under the "Game" menu.

NOTE: A ZSNES save state is not the same as an in-game save state. A game may only allow a user to save state when arriving at specific game milestones whereas ZSNES save states can be captured at any time during gameplay.
